name: enterprise-admin_create-registration-token-for-enterprise
description:
Returns a token that you can pass to the `config` script. The token expires after one hour.

You must authenticate using an access token with the `admin:enterprise` scope to use this endpoint.

#### Example using registration token

Configure your self-hosted runner, replacing `TOKEN` with the registration token provided by this endpoint.

```
./config.sh --url https://github.com/enterprises/octo-enterprise --token TOKEN
```

enterprise.description: The slug version of the enterprise name. You can also substitute this value with the enterprise id.

$ul: **repositories**: The repositories this token has access to
**repository_selection**: Describe whether all repositories have been selected or there's a selection involved
